channel.title: Hugo on Brian Z
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Brian Z

item.title: Getting started with hugo
item.description: It’s been a very very long time since I’ve posted anything publicly. Blogging has drastically changed since the early days. As most of you, I consume a lot of material and resources on the internet. For a while I’ve wanted to contribute back…I’m constantly learning new things and some of them are really useful. So, this is my way to hopefully help others. With that, my inaugural post will be on how I set up this blog.
